mapper.select: SELECT YEAR || '-' || MONTH || '-' || DAY AS stat_day, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{api_type1} THEN CHARGE_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS b_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{api_type2} THEN CANCEL_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS d_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{api_type3} THEN REFUND_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS f_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{api_type1} THEN TRANSACTION_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS i_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{api_type2} THEN TRANSACTION_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS k_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{api_type3} THEN TRANSACTION_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS m_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{api_type3} THEN CHARGE_AVG ELSE 0 END) AS p_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{api_type3} THEN CANCE_AVG ELSE 0 END) AS r_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{api_type3} THEN REFUND_AVG ELSE 0 END) AS t_stat FROM TB_AUTH_STATS_DAILY WHERE YEAR = #{year} AND MONTH = #{month} AND DAY = #{day} GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH, DAY
